Prompt: Generate a keyword-driven test case for TC_08 Validate Customer Is Able To Schedule AutoPay Payments On A Sunday Of The Week
Response:
***Settings***
    Library     SeleniumLibrary
        
    ***Test Cases***
    Validate Schedule AutoPay
        [Arguments] ${day_of_week} ${payment_details}
        [Return] ${boolean}
        [Documentation] Checks if the customer is able to schedule AutoPay payments specifically on a Sunday; returns true if successful.
Documentation: This test checks for the ability to schedule payments on Sundays, highlighting the critical role of specific days in payment processing
